summary: The module implements a lightweight PyTorch Lightning DataModule that creates synthetic datasets and corresponding data loaders for training, validation, and testing of GPT-style language models. It includes a mock dataset class that generates random token sequences and integrates with Megatron data sampling utilities.
business_intent: Enable rapid prototyping, testing, and debugging of large language model pipelines without the overhead of preparing real-world corpora, thereby accelerating development and reducing resource consumption.
